name: Bitcoin.ℏ
description: Bitcoin.ℏ (BTC.ℏ) is a next-generation cryptocurrency that preserves Bitcoin’s core principles—scarcity, decentralization, and trust—while enhancing scalability, efficiency, and sustainability. Built on the Hedera Hashgraph network, BTC.ℏ leverages asynchronous Byzantine Fault Tolerance (aBFT) to ensure high security and speed, with transaction costs as low as $0.0001. Its key utilities include seamless global payments, micro-transactions, donations, and real-time tipping, making it ideal for modern digital economies and content-driven platforms. Designed to be quantum-resilient and eco-friendly, BTC.ℏ is built for a decentralized and sustainable financial future.
